Text:
Dragonfish:
Why do you think the video should be uploaded in AVI?

Or would it be better to use the MKV container?

Enjoy.

Thanks Appen... and btw.. your uploads are fine in mp4.. if somebody wants .avi. then they can convert themselves.. only takes a few mins. Keep up the good work and cheers again
